name: Cezar
desc: A Caesar salad  is a green salad of romaine lettuce and croutons dressed with lemon juice.

name: Capricciosa
desc: Pizza capricciosa is a style of pizza in Italian cuisine prepared with mozzarella cheese, Italian baked ham, mushroom, artichoke and tomato.

name: Vegeteriana
desc: Pizza Vegetariana is a Main dish. It begins at level 0. To achieve level 10 in this dish, you need 10 mushrooms, 10 oregano, 10 sweetcorn and 10 vials of olive.

name: Vegeterian salad
desc: You can use any fruits and vegetables to make many kinds of salads. The simplest vegetable salad is to chop up lettuce and mix it with any other vegetable

name: Coca cola
desc: Coca-Cola, or Coke, is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by The Coca-Cola Company.

name: Beer
desc: Beer is one of the oldest and most widely consumed alcoholic drinks in the world

name: Coffee
desc: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted coffee beans, the seeds of berries from certain Coffea species.

name: Cheese
desc: Cheese is a dairy product, derived from milk and produced in wide ranges of flavors, textures and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein.

name: Chili
desc: The chili pepper from Nahuatl chÄ«lli is the berry-fruit of plants from the genus Capsicum which are members of the nightshade family, Solanaceae.

name: Strawberry salad
desc: The garden strawberry is a widely grown hybrid species of the genus Fragaria, collectively known as the strawberries

name: Broccoli
desc: Broccolini or baby broccoli is a green vegetable similar to broccoli but with smaller florets and longer, thin stalks

name: Green salad
desc: Here are 13 of the healthiest leafy green vegetables to include in your diet.

name: Tuna salad
desc: A tuna is a saltwater fish that belongs to the tribe Thunnini, a subgrouping of the Scombridae (mackerel) family.

name: Tomato salad
desc: The tomato is the edible berry of the plant Solanum lycopersicum, commonly known as a tomato plant.
